org.codehaus.gmavenplus.groovyworkarounds

Class DotGroovyFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.File
      • org.codehaus.gmavenplus.groovyworkarounds.DotGroovyFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<File>

    public class DotGroovyFile
extends File
    This class exists solely to trick JavaStubCompilationUnit.addSource(java.io.File) into letting us use files that don't end in ".groovy" (as a workaround for GROOVY-5021).
    Author:
    Keegan Witt
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
